deployment.author: Christopher Atwell
deployment.message:
Implement player authentication and proof-of-play
Added player activation, authentication, and token refresh endpoints, including new models, repositories, services, controllers, and validators for player tokens and proof-of-play tracking. Updated authentication and authorization middleware to support player JWT tokens and unified user type definitions. Modified player device routes to require player authentication and added proof-of-play endpoint. Created and updated documentation files to reflect the new player authentication flow and API requirements.
